value:
$WmMPID_比翼ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|I don't believe we've been properly
introduced. I'm Hector. And this is
my daughter, Lilina.$k$pLilina, do you want to say hello?$k$p$nMPID_リリーナ|...Hello. It's nice...to meet you.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドズラ,ch08_13_Dozzla_M_Halloween19,Face|Gwah ha ha! What a sweet little
lass you are. Reminds me of Princess
L'Arachel when she was that age.$k$pThe two of you are just like the
two of us: two people, one soul.$k$pWith a partner like that, you've
nothing to fear no matter where
you go! Right, Hector? Hah!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_リリーナ,ch03_05_Hector_MF_Pair,Face|Father, I think we should retreat
for now.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロドズラ,ch08_13_Dozzla_M_Halloween19,Face|Gwah ha ha! She's a clever one, all
right! Just like Princess L'Arachel!$k$p$Sbs150|
